S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-1468: Server returns data when it receives a QRYROWSET value of zero on an OPNQRY, which doesn't follow DRDA protocol.
The patch disables pre-fetching for LMTBLKPRC when QRYROWSET=0 and adds a test case to the protocol test which sends an OPNQRY for a scrollable cursor with QRYROWSET=0.
